channel.title: Help me please rly need it
channel.description: hi, i have gotten a zdr source, but it has no right click options, idk how to add this so could some 1 tell me or send me a zdr link that has right click, ile rep++ who ever helps

item.title: Help me please rly need it
item.dc:creator: @i_nelson_i i nelson i
item.source: Help me please rly need it

item.title: Help me please rly need it
item.dc:creator: @Project_Evolution Project Evolution
item.description:
@Project_Evolution wrote:

Actually hold on. I think I can get it.

Ok under,

public void initialize()

Add,

[code] outStream.createFrameVarSize(104);
outStream.writeByteC(3); // 0 for walk?, 1 for trade, 2 for duel, 3 for attacking, 4 for trade, 5 for right-click kicking, 6+ nothing
outStream.writeByteA(1);
outStream.writeString(“Attack”);
outStream.endFrameVarSize();

            outStream.createFrameVarSize(104);
            outStream.writeByteC(0); // 0 for walk?, 1 for trade, 2 for duel, 3 for attacking, 4 for trade, 5 for right-click kicking, 6+ nothing
            outStream.writeByteA(1);
            outStream.writeString("Walk Here");
            outStream.endFrameVarSize();
}

            outStream.createFrameVarSize(104);
            outStream.writeByteC(1); // command slot (does it matter which one?)
            outStream.writeByteA(0); // 0 or 1; 0 if command should be placed on top in context menu
            outStream.writeString("Trade with");
            outStream.endFrameVarSize();

            outStream.createFrameVarSize(104);
            outStream.writeByteC(0); // 0 for walk?, 1 for trade, 2 for duel, 3 for attacking, 4 for trade, 5 for right-click kicking, 6+ nothing
            outStream.writeByteA(0);
            outStream.writeString("Walk Here");
            outStream.endFrameVarSize();
}[/code]

Read full topic
